{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Aenia |image = Portrait_Aenia_convo.png |image2 = PE2 Aenia.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 12 |CON = 11 |DEX = 9 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 2 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 5 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 0 |fortitude = 6 |reflex = -2 |will = 0 |dr = 3 |ability = [Hale and Hardy](/haleAndHardyDeadfire/), [Zealous Focus](/zealousFocusDeadfire/) |location = [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), outside the [Vailian Trading Company Headquarters](/vailianTradingCompanyHeadquarters/) |quests = [Bounty - Biakara](/bountyBiakara/)
[Bounty - Veen](/bountyVeen/)
[Bounty - Desiwa the Shark](/bountyDesiwaTheShark/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear |head = Vailian Hat |body = Vailian Clothing (Deadfire){{!}}Vailian Clothing |internalname = NPC_VD_VTC_Bounty_Giver |guid = 052543ef-93c8-4e0c-a4ff-8b0ff535f6f0 }} '''Aenia''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|No sooner do you approach the Vailian woman than she squints and turns up her nose, regarding you with thinly-veiled distaste.}} Aenia is another bounty hunter fixer, giving out contracts for those in need. As a noble of Vailian origin, she's particularly stuck up... And for all her connections in terms of bounties, she can't seem to keep abreast of the latest developments - such as a Watcher landing in Neketaka. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [Bounty - Biakara](/bountyBiakara/)
[Bounty - Veen](/bountyVeen/)
[Bounty - Desiwa the Shark](/bountyDesiwaTheShark/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * Aenia is the VTC bounty giver. All of her bounties involve ship hunting. [Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
